body:
I added the conversion to at::ArrayRef<Elem> for constant lists. This makes sure you are still explicit when you are copying the list but makes this expression only:
`std::vector<int64_t>(*list)`
body_html:
I added the conversion to at::ArrayRef for constant lists. This makes sure you are still explicit when you are copying the list but makes this expression only:
std::vector<int64_t>(*list)
